Name: nameColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the name column, when set to false name column will not be rendered.

Name: sizeColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the size column, when set to false size column will not be rendered.

Name: typeColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the type column, when set to false type column will not be rendered.

Name: functionColumnRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the function column, when set to false function column will not be rendered.

Name: uploadRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the upload icon, when set to false upload icon will not be rendered.

Name: downloadRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the download icon, when set to false download icon will not be rendered.

Name: deleteRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the delete icon, when set to false delete icon will not be rendered.

Name: messageRendered
Description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the message, when set to false message will not be rendered.

Name: fileLimit
Description: Number of files are in the given ICase.

Name: updatedComponentAfterUploaded
Description: Component will be triggered the update after document is uploaded.

Name: downloadIcon
Description: Icon class will be displayed in download link.

Name: downloadStyleClass
Description: Styles for download link.

Name: deleteIcon
Description: Icon class will be displayed in delete link.

Name: deleteStyleClass
Description: Styles for delete link.

Name: updatedComponentAfterDeleted
Description: Component will be triggered the update after document is deleted.

Name: selectedType
Description: String value to specify the selected document types, by default it will be first element in ``typeSelectionItems``.

Name: typeSelectionItems
Description: String value to specify the list of document type.

Name: enableScriptCheckingForUploadedDocument
Description:
| Boolean value to specify script checking. Set to ``true`` to enable script checking.
| The setting will detect Portal setting ``Portal.Document.EnableScriptChecking`` as its default value, refer to :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If the Portal setting is not available, defaults to ``false``.

Name: enableVirusScannerForUploadedDocument
Description:
| Boolean value to specify virus scanning. Set to ``true`` to enable virus scanning. Refer to :ref:`Virus Scanning Setting<settings-virus-scanning-setting>` for more details.
| The setting will detect Portal setting ``Portal.Document.EnableVirusScanner`` as its default value, refer to :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If Portal setting is not available, default value is ``false``.

Name: allowedUploadFileTypes
Description:
| String value to specify the list of file extension that can be uploaded.
| The setting will detect Portal setting ``Portal.Document.WhitelistExtension`` as its default value, refer to :ref:`update-portal-settings` for more details.
| If Portal setting is not available, default value is ``doc,docx,xls,xlsx,xlsm,csv,pdf,ppt,pptx,txt,zip,jpg,jpeg,bmp,png``.
